# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [1.0.0] - 2026-01-05

### Added
- Initial release of Blog2Podcasts
- Web scraping with trafilatura for article extraction
- AI summarization using Ollama (local LLM)
- Text-to-speech using Microsoft Edge TTS
- Voice cloning from YouTube videos using Coqui TTS (XTTS-v2)
- Command-line interface with rich output
- Support for multiple voices and languages
- Configurable speech rate and pitch
- Script preview mode
- Custom output naming

### Features
- Convert any blog URL to podcast audio
- High-quality TTS with multiple voice options
- Local, private processing with Ollama
- Voice cloning capability from YouTube sources
